FuncDef: The reset l2tp-user urpf discard statistics command clears the number of URPF-dropped L2TP user packets.
CLIs: reset l2tp-user urpf discard statistics [ ipv4 | ipv6 ] [ slot <slot-id> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Number of IPv4 URPF-dropped packets to be cleared.
-

Number of IPv6 URPF-dropped packets to be cleared.
-

Slot ID of an interface board that is in position.
-

ExtraInfo: If you want to reset the number of URPF-dropped L2TP user packets, run the reset l2tp-user urpf discard statistics to clear the original statistics.
